targets.expr: sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{node=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"} - node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{node=~"$node", deploymentType="$deploymentType", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"}) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{node=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"})

node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{node=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{node=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{node=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{node=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"})

sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{instance=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) / sum(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{instance=~"${node}", deploymentType=~"${deploymentType}", environment=~"${environment:pipe}"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim)
